ComicInfo.Title: The Slaying Axe
ComicInfo.Summary:
Who will claim the “Reaper of Ishtar”, the mythical and ancient weapon that kills dragons? Here is the story of an axe that has passed into the hands of the greatest heroes, in a chain stretching back in time for centuries.
This story follows not a character, but a weapon, an axe forged from a metal transformed by Veill of a Great Dragon... A powerful weapon, one of the first three wielded by the Order of the Dragon Knights, a blade that cuts men and animals. But will the tales and exploits of the Knights that carried it suffice to give courage to its latest bearer?
